data.message:
Please anyone help me please My account is locked and i can't confirm  the security check what should i do 😢😢 My Account is really importen pls help me facebook. And why block my account tell me the reason!!! 
Because i add friend 10person up one day??
I confirm alot of person per day??
Orr other?
And i have another question to ask you facebook do i get banned when i confirm friend request?? I think it will get banned when i sending friend request to unknow person right??? But i confirm some people added me then it load " Session Expired please log in again" then i log in again it says please confirm the indentity i confirm it already then it load please complete the security check "please choose one of the following methods to confirm your identiy" But that step when i tap on it nothing happen !! That why i ask you to help me

replies.message: Hi Ah. It sounds like you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: https://www.facebook.com/help/116393198446749?sr=1&sid=0nEA9Re5zkLwtYL47 -Hailey
Facebook will block you for petty garbage but they don't care to tackle the serious stuff
